item.title: [DOXIA-714] MarkdownSink: Fix table justification and figures
item.description: Table justification is currently not implemented at all (i.e. all table columns have default alignment) and figures are using the XHTML markup instead of the native Markdown markup.
item.summary: MarkdownSink: Fix table justification and figures

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
